snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday named Norman B. Champ III, a former hedge fund general counsel, as its director of investment management.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday named Norman B. Champ III, a former hedge fund general counsel, as its director of investment management.

headline.main: S.E.C. Names Director of Investment Management

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
